Hey Internet friend,

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene, a researcher and designer from Amsterdam. I'm specialized in making tools for people at work. Thank you for visiting my personal site. This is a quiet street on the Internet, a place for soft stances, lived experiences, and critical notes on the things I hold dear.
